content: the pattern is worked in the round from the top down so it is easy to try it on as you go and acheive a correct fit pattern includes decrease row so that you can fit the sweater to your waist pattern is designed to be a close fit with negative ease yardage is for the 36 size other sizes have not been tested if you make an alternate size i would love feedback i used 4x50g cream 2x50g purple and 2x50g navy with plenty of leftovers of the last 3 balls for my stripy 36 sweater original pattern contains error in round 3 this was corrected on 25th may 2013 round 3 should read round 3 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet *skip 2 sts double_crochet 2dc ch2 2dc into chain space double_crochet skip 2 sts 2dc double_crochet ch2 double_crochet into chain space 2dc repeat from * around omitting last double_crochet sl-st into 1st chain to join 2 sl sts ch3 turn 120 128 136 144 152 160 sts larger sizes may wish to alter the sleeves to be wider there is a link a pattern for doing this on the pattern and above
